{{html:

        }}





@col 12
{{html:
<div class="account-container stacked">
<div class="content clearfix padding">
<form method="post" action="./index.html">
        
    <h1>Sign In</h1>        
    
    <div class="login-fields">
        
        <p>Sign in using your registered account:</p>
        <div class="alert alert-error" style="display: none">
          Please enter the correct username & password.
        </div>
        <div class="field">
            <label for="username">Username:</label>
            <input type="text" id="username" name="username" value="" placeholder="Username" class="login username-field" data-bind="value: loginModel.username" />
        </div> <!-- /field -->
        
        <div class="field">
            <label for="password">Password:</label>
            <input type="password" id="password" name="password" value="" placeholder="Password" class="login password-field" data-bind="value: loginModel.password"/>
        </div> <!-- /password -->
        
    </div> <!-- /login-fields -->
    
    <div class="login-actions">
        
       
                            
        <button class="button btn btn-info btn-large" data-bind="click: loginModel.login">Sign In</button>
        
    </div> <!-- .actions -->
	</form>
    </div>
	</div>
}}
@divend
